rows.label: qev087606_MSG0001
rows.name:
I do not regret leaving the ranks of the Ganglion to
follow a path I can take pride in as a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087606_MSG0002
rows.name:
But my decision has placed a weighty burden on our
children, as well as those who were hurt in the fighting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087606_MSG0003
rows.name:
And now we are in dire need of medicine.
Bring us medical supplies and you will have our aid.
I swear it on my name as a Wrothian![ST:wait ]
